summary: The קורסCDO – CDAiO מחזור14 is a professional program designed to train participants in the roles and responsibilities of Chief Data Analytics and AI Officers. The course is hosted by Bar-Ilan University's School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, which serves as a bridge between academia and industry. The program offers a hybrid learning environment with advanced facilities, including optical fiber connections and multimedia equipment. The curriculum covers a wide range of topics, including data strategy, cloud security, data governance, AI/ML, data monetization, and digital transformation. Participants will engage in 27 professional sessions and 2 enrichment sessions, with a focus on practical application through a final project. The course emphasizes career development, offering workshops on building personal portfolios, effective presentations, and career strategy. Graduates receive a prestigious certificate from Bar-Ilan University, recognized for its academic and industry partnerships. The program also includes collaboration with the MIT Chief Data Officer and Information Quality Symposium, providing global insights and networking opportunities.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: קורס CDO – CDAiO מחזור 14

COURSE OVERVIEW: The CDO – CDAiO course is designed to bridge the gap between academia and industry, providing a unique and innovative learning framework. The program aims to equip participants with the knowledge and skills necessary to integrate, advance, and excel in the high-tech and cyber industries. The course offers hybrid learning opportunities, international certifications, and career development workshops, ensuring participants are well-prepared for the challenges of the modern data-driven world.

TARGET AUDIENCE: Not explicitly mentioned.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: 
- Eran Shaham: Manager of the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security. Contact: eran.shaham@biu.ac.il, 050-6560666.
- Esther Agayev: Course Coordinator. Contact: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il, 052-5886002.
- Ido Biger: CDAiO Track Leader, EVP, CIO – Delek US, and CEO at DK. Formerly CDO at ELAL Israel Airlines and Head of Data at Yes.
- Lior Israeli: CDAiO Track Leader, Head of Data, AI & Analytics – Circles AI. Formerly Manager of Data & AI Strategy at Deloitte. Contact: lior.israeli@gmail.com, 052-2553468.
- Oren Mizrahi: Lecturer in AI/ML, Data Science & CDO Operational Management. VP, Chief Data & Analytics Officer at Menora Mivtachim.
- Einat Shimoni: Lecturer in CDO, Data & AI Literacy. EVP Researcher of Technology Trends at STKI.
- Itay Hazan: Lecturer in Data Monetization. CFO at PayBox. Formerly Strategic Director at Oracle.
- Alon Schwartz: Lecturer in Digital Transformation and Data. Head of Data, Analytics, and AI at Proceed.
- Oren Harel: Lecturer in Data Governance Technologies. Consultant in Data Management and Governance.
- Tani Shapira: Lecturer, Privacy Protection Expert, and DPO.
- Hillel Koberovsky: Lecturer in Cyber Security and Career Management. Expert at Fortinet.
- Dor Eliav: Lecturer in Effective Presentations and Public Speaking.
- Oren Yeager: Lecturer in Cloud Transformation and Architecture. CISO and Cloud Security Expert.

PREREQUISITES: Not explicitly mentioned.

CERTIFICATIONS: Certificate of completion from Bar-Ilan University, International certifications from EC-Council, VMware, Fortinet, ISACA, AWS.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: November 4, 2024.
- End Date: February 4, 2025.
- Duration: 27 professional sessions + 2 enrichment sessions.
- Schedule: Mondays and Thursdays, 17:30–21:30. Additional enrichment sessions on other days as announced.
- Physical attendance is highly recommended for interaction and networking.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Physical Learning Environment: 
  - Classrooms: Buildings 403 and 505.
  - Protected Area: Building 404, Floor 1.
  - Coffee Corner: Building 403, Floor 1, near Room 68.
  - Cafeteria: Between Buildings 403 and 404.
  - Parking: Paid parking available at 20₪ per evening or 300₪ for the course duration.
- Digital Learning Environment: 
  - WhatsApp group for the class.
  - Permanent Zoom link.
  - Drive folder with lecture recordings, presentations, and additional materials.
  - Course contact list.
  - WiFi settings in the classroom.
  - Alumni group post-course.

TUITION AND FEES: 
- Parking fees: 20₪ per evening or 300₪ for the course duration.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Data & Insights Driven Organization.
- The CDAiO Roles, Responsibilities, and Agenda Overview.
- Data Strategy Building Process, Management, and Measurement.
- Data Platform & Architecture.
- Cloud Journey and Security.
- Data Privacy & Regulations.
- Organizational Data Governance.
- The Data Analyst.
- Data Visualization & Storytelling.
- Data Science Life Cycle and Machine Learning.
- Data Science Operation Management.
- Data Governance Management Technologies.
- Generative AI Projects.
- Data Monetization.
- Executive Look at Modern Project Management with AI as Co-Pilot.
- Data & AI Literacy.
- CDAiO Final Project & Summary Lecture.
- Career Management & LinkedIn Appearance.
- Building a Winning Presentation & Persuasive Speeches.
- Advanced Project Management for Data Products.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- Course Coordinator: Esther Agayev. Contact: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il, 052-5886002.
- Parking registration: Contact the coordinator with vehicle details.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: 
- School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, Bar-Ilan University.
- Partnerships with leading companies: EC-Council, VMware, Fortinet, ISACA, AWS.
- Collaboration with MIT Chief Data Officer and Information Quality Symposium.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION: 
- Final Project: Submission by February 4, 2025. Includes a written report and a presentation.
- Estimated effort: 30 hours.
- Materials and recordings available for 3 months post-course.
- Intellectual property rights belong to the lecturers/university and are for personal use only.

Thank you for choosing the CDO – CDAiO course at Bar-Ilan University!
